news.title: Trump to deploy National Guard in response to Los Angeles immigration protests
news.summary: California Gov. Gavin Newsom said that Trump was being "purposefully inflammatory" in sending National Guard troops to L.A. Newsom called the move a "dangerous move"

news.title: Trump wants to bring manufacturing jobs back. The aviation industry can't hire fast enough
news.summary: The aviation industry is facing a retirement wave of workers who make and fix airplanes. The retirement wave is expected to begin in the next few years.

news.title: Trump says Elon Musk will face 'serious consequences' if he backs Democratic candidates
news.summary: President Donald Trump says he thinks his relationship with Elon Musk is over. The pair have been feuding for months, but their public spat erupted this week.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts believe in the potential of these stocks despite macro woes
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service highlights three stocks favored by Wall Street's top pros. Nvidia, Salesforce and Salesforce are among the stocks on the list.

news.title: Elon Musk appears to delete some explosive X posts amid feud with Trump
news.summary: Elon Musk and President Donald Trump have been involved in a public spat this week. Musk is the CEO of the electric car company Tesla. Trump is the President of the United States.

news.title: How reliable is U.S. economic data? It’s a growing risk for investors awaiting the next Fed rate cut.
news.summary: Questions about inflation and labor-market data could influence the central bank’s decision-making, and potentially impact markets. The central bank is expected to keep its key rate at a record low of 1.5 percent.

news.title: I have $1,000 in credit-card debt. Will I be able to hide my inheritance from the bank?
news.summary: “The debt stems from over five years ago, and I forgot about it,” he said. “The money is in my bank account, and it’s not going anywhere.”

news.title: Social Security’s new commissioner, rule reversals and cost cuts: Here’s everything that’s happening at the agency
news.summary: A Social Security “war room,” threats to shut the agency, worker buyouts and a restraining order — here’s a timeline of what has taken place so far this year.

news.title: Supreme Court grants DOGE access to Social Security data, days after Musk stepped down
news.summary: The decision is the latest development in a battle over the Department of Government Efficiency’s access to sensitive personal information. The decision is also the latest in a long-running battle over access to personal information by the government.

news.title: Tony Awards: Here’s how one woman saw every Broadway show this season — for less than $50 a ticket on average
news.summary: Liz Davenport used every trick in the discount playbook, including serving as a volunteer usher. She was able to get in for a fraction of the price she would normally pay.
